greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = a(1)*a(n-1) + a(2)*a(n-2) + ...+ a(n-1)*a(1) for n >= 4.
mathematica: nmax = 30; aa = ConstantArray[0,nmax]; aa[[1]] = 2; aa[[2]] = 1; aa[[3]] = 1; Do[aa[[n]] = Sum[aa[[k]] * aa[[n-k]],{k,1,n-1}],{n,4,nmax}]; aa (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 25 2015 *)
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_
